derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'anchoritic'): from late Latin monasticus, from Greek monastikos, from monazein 'live alone'

entry.tran: 僧侣的;修士(或修女的);修道院的
entry.def: Monastic means relating to monks or to a monastery.
